Column3: used when you are giving a choice of two or more things
used to say that something is the reason why something else happens
Column4: bu nedenle, bu yüzden, bu bakımdan
...ar/er ... maz/mez; yapar yapmaz, olur olmaz, gelir gelmez vs.

Column3: used to talk about a choice between two or more possibilities
Column4: iki veya daha çok olasılık arasındaki seçimden bahsederken; ...ıp/ip ...meyeceğini/mayacağını

Column3: used to introduce a fact or opinion that makes the other part of the sentence seem surprising
starting from a particular time, date, etc
used to talk about how another person or thing is affected by something
used to describe how a situation seems to be
used to describe the purpose, job, or appearance of something or someone
used to compare two things, people, amounts, etc
used instead of 'who' or 'which' at the beginning of a relative clause
